description: Risk-aware routing engine computing safer detours in under 200 ms and increasing routing safety scoring by 32%. Uses anonymous clustering to improve the reliability of incident reports.

title: Global Trade ETL Pipelines
description: Parallel ETL pipeline processing 10K+ XML trade records per batch, reducing parse time from 90s to 15s. Enforces 100% schema coverage with Pandera and uses idempotent upserts plus audit logging.

title: Dual Wordle Solver
description: Bayesian solver that achieves 5.43 average guesses across 300 simulations. Exposes a Ruby REST API for inference and a React UI to visualize probability updates for each guess.
